mapper.select: SELECT rental_start_date, rental_end_date FROM RENTAL WHERE prd_id = #{id} AND rent_status = "01"

SELECT GD.ID , GD.NAME , GD.IMAGE_URL , GD.PRICE , RT.LENDER_EMAIL , RT.RENTAL_START_DATE , RT.RENTAL_END_DATE , RT.RENT_STATUS FROM RENTAL AS RT LEFT OUTER JOIN GOODS as GD ON GD.ID = RT.PRD_ID WHERE RT.BORROWER_EMAIL = #{email};

SELECT GD.ID , GD.NAME , GD.IMAGE_URL , GD.PRICE , RT.BORROWER_EMAIL , RT.RENTAL_START_DATE , RT.RENTAL_END_DATE , RT.RENT_STATUS FROM RENTAL AS RT LEFT OUTER JOIN GOODS as GD ON GD.ID = RT.PRD_ID WHERE RT.LENDER_EMAIL = #{email};
